response.overview: we wrote this film during a time when we felt time was moving to fast and changes where around every corner as a kind of closure. and under a painful kind of irony, the same sudden changes are exactly what made us unable to finish the film.  the film is a comedy mockumentary about a kid who just finished highschool and feels like his friends are outgrowing him and he can't handle the changes. so before they all part and go to different colleges he decides to make a documentary lamenting their friendship.  how ever we were only able to get a few shots in the second act after nearly everything goes wrong and he runs into a cult in the woods. I've been sitting with this footage for years thinking it seemed random and dumb without context. but recently I decided screw it, we had fun shooting this and it would be a shame if it just sat in the deleted files archive forever.  so without any further waiting I present. one last summer. .
response.title: One last summer (deleted short film)
